hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT v FROM DocumentVersion v WHERE v.id IN ( SELECT max(v.id) FROM DocumentVersion v WHERE v.documentId = :documentId) )
SELECT v FROM DocumentVersion v WHERE v.tag = 'WORKING' AND v.documentId = :documentId
SELECT v FROM DocumentVersion v WHERE v.tag = 'PUBLISHED' AND v.documentId = :documentId
SELECT v FROM DocumentVersion v WHERE v.documentId = :documentId AND v.number = :versionNumber
SELECT v FROM DocumentVersion v WHERE v.documentId = :documentId
SELECT v FROM DocumentVersion v WHERE v.documentId = :documentId AND v.tag = :versionTag
